    public class ShortestPathsVertex
extends Vertex<org.apache.hadoop.io.LongWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.DoubleWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.DoubleWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.DoubleWritable>

      • compute

        public void compute(Iterable<org.apache.hadoop.io.DoubleWritable> messages)
             throws IOException
        从类复制的说明: Vertex
        Must be defined by user to do computation on a single Vertex.
        指定者:
        compute 在类中 Vertex<org.apache.hadoop.io.LongWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.DoubleWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.DoubleWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.DoubleWritable>
        参数:
        messages - Messages that were sent to this vertex in the previous superstep. Each message is only guaranteed to have a life expectancy as long as next() is not called.
        抛出:
        IOException
